item.en-US: Improved video streaming reliability on InspectionWorks Connect Local
Improvement in 'Share to iPhone' soft key in File Manager
MDI Report provides correct image order when leaf nodes are at different levels of the tree
Virtual keyboard shift key improvement
USB keyboard is no longer Shifted until user selects Shift key on virtual keyboard
InspectionWorks Insight capable – wireless upload to cloud application
Noise Reduction image processing tool as part of POD package (Part number: MFL-POD)
Built-in hotspot
Maximum Target Distance (MTD) with stereo measurement (Part number: MFL-ST)
Dynamic Advisory System with stereo measurement (Part number: MFL-ST)
Captive portal access
USB keyboard support
Ethernet connectivity via USB adapter
New progress bar during boot-up
Faster boot-up time: ~1:30
Removed green flash on-screen during startup
Font size increased in text annotation, measurement value & icon size, and Settings menu
Logo and Date & Time are now user-selectable options for 'burning in' to saved images
MDI 'Breadcrumbs' are now active for navigation
On-device video playback tearing
Faster image Save operation
Wi-Fi connectivity improvements
Re-saving MDI images outside the MDI no longer loses the burned-in 'breadcrumb'
Custom measurement result positions are now maintained on save instead of being reset to the default location
Navigating to next/previous recalled images now updates the highlighted item when returning to File Manager
Navigating ‘up’ the MDI inspection tree now correctly highlights the node you just came
MDI reports now convert area measurements to inches correctly
Screenshots can now be captured via double-click of the Save button (hard key and touch control)
Support for NTFS formatted USB drives
Support for internal memory disable (Part number: MFL-NOIM)
MDI report generation and preview now -50 seconds faster
Improved joystick control of measurement cursors and annotations
Much faster thumbnail generation for images saved with this release of software
Updated stereo measurement zoom window 'cross-hairs' to show the match strength color of the current cursor
Build release date now part of the software version number displayed in Settings | About
Fixed an issue causing a green line up on right side of live video when zooming out
Fixed bug where steering cables were not relaxing on shutdown from steer & stay mode
Revised truncation of filenames to put the ellipses (.„) in the middle, for easier identification of similar files
Fixed bug where PDF Viewer (including for MDI Report Preview) was not always opening to first page of the document
Fixed bug where user was unable to navigate the levels of the MDI node list by selecting the 'breadcrumbs' at the top
Updated which screens will display the Record touch icon
Fixed bug where tip selection lists did not highlight currently selected tip when opened
Fixed bug where stereo index was not being displayed correctly in all Recall states
Fixed bug where empty folders were not being copied in File Manager
Fixed bug where a USB drive with an update file on it could not be ejected
Fixed bug where various Settings list controls did not highlight the current selection when opened
Fixed bugs regarding enabling/disabling the Undo button while in measurement mode
Fixed bug where the Enter key would only highlight, but not select, a language in the language selection list
Fixed bug where iOS Device names weren't being truncated correctly when necessary
MDI node list now remembers the leaf node you were on upon returning to the list
Virtual keyboard keys are now properly highlighted when they have joystick focus
Fixed multiple bugs regarding joystick operations on inverted images
Changed MDI Report 'Include PDF' Setting to default to On
Fixed bug where measurement results were not updated if Distortion Correction image transform was turned off
Fixed bug where measurement results were not being correctly updated if the currently selected tip was changed
